title: Aw Isu kei min kal pel suh
lyrics:
Aw Isu, kei min kal pel suh.
I hnen awm ka duh;
Mi dangte pawh i koh laiin,
Kei, mi kal pel suh.

Isu, Isu, mi sual ka ni a,
Nangmah lo chuanin ka thi ang,
Aw, mi khawngaih rawh.

Nangin min khawngaih ka hria e,
Ka thil tihsual pawh;
Nangman min ngaihnathiam thin e,
Aw, mi khawngaih rawh.

Ka sual zawng zawng i tifai tawh,
Kalvari tlangah;
Ka hrehawm Nangin i tuar tawh,
Aw, mi kal pel suh.

Kumkhuain ka zui zel ang che,
Hrehawm mah sela;
Theihtawpin kraws ka pu ang a,
Aw, mi khawngaih rawh.

Hrehawm zawng zawng ka lo tuar ang,
Pawisa tawp lovin;
Kumkhuain Nangin min pui la,
Aw, mi kal pel suh.
